means: 土霉素，氧四环素，地霉素

word_mean: 〔USP〕氧四环素，土霉素：一种四环素族的广谱抗菌素，由龟裂链霉菌产生，分子式为C22H24N2O9·2H2O，黄色结晶粉末，主要用做抗菌剂，肌注

sentence.Network_en: Least effective were chlortetracycline, oxytetracycline, and tetracycline.
sentence.Network_cn: 效力最差的是金霉素 、 土霉素和四环素.

sentence.Network_en: A high sensitivity , HPLC method was developed for determining oxytetracycline ( OTC ) in c α rp.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究了鲤鱼体内土霉素 ( Oxytetracycline,OTC ) 的高效液相色谱分析方法.

sentence.Network_en: A sensitive stripping voltammetric procedure for determining oxytetracycline ( OTC ) is described.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文叙述吸附溶出分析 土霉素 的灵敏方法.

means.word_mean: 1. a yellow crystalline antibiotic (trademark Terramycin) obtained from a soil actinomycete; used to treat various bacterial and rickettsial infections
